titleStmt.title: Of romanizing recusants, and dissembling Catholicks. A counter-maund of a counterfeit embassage. Or, An answer to the posthume pamphlet of Ralfe Buckland sometime a popish priest secretly printed and published after his death about a yeere a goe.
titleStmt.author: Sanderson, Thomas, 1560 or 61-1614.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
